ARABIC: وَلَهُ ٱلْجَوَارِ ٱلْمُنشَـَٔاتُ فِى ٱلْبَحْرِ كَٱلْأَعْلَٰمِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: His, too, are the ships sailing like mountain peaks on the sea.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: His are the high-sailed vessels in deep ocean like the mountains.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: His are the ships, towering on the sea like mountains.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: By His command, the ships with raised masts sail on the sea like mountains.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: To Him only belong the sailing ships, raised above the sea like hills.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And His are Al-Jawar Al-Munsha'at, in the seas like A`lam.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And His are the ships reared aloft in the sea like mountains.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: His too are the ships that run, raised up in the sea like land-marks.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: His are the ships displayed upon the sea, like banners.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: His are the lofty ships, that rear aloft on the sea like mountains.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: His are the ships with elevated sails upon the sea like mountains.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: His are the sailing ships on the sea [appearing] like landmarks.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And His are the Ships sailing smoothly through the seas, lofty as mountains:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And His are the ships going and coming in the seas, like mountains.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Also, His are the ships that run, raised up like mountains upon the sea.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: His are the ships, raised above the sea like landmarks.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And to Him belong the ships [with sails] elevated in the sea like mountains.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [55:24] His are the crafted ships [that sail] in the sea [appearing] like landmarks, like mountains in their tremendous size and height.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: His are the ships displayed) floating (upon the sea, like banners) like mountains, that is when the ships raise their sails.
